channel.title: Now on Ashley Drake
channel.description: Recent content in Now on Ashley Drake

item.title: Mar 1
item.description: I’ve recently signed on to help out more with Exercism, by becoming a maintainer for the Python track. I’m still figuring out how to work on such a large project; this past weekend I managed to send an email & Github ping that should have gone to my subteam of 3-5 Python maintainers, to the whole (150 people) group of maintainers; I messed something up trying to rebase from master and it was gross.

item.title: Dec 2
item.description: Advent of Code: trying to solve all the puzzles this year, in multiple languages if I can. Unicorn Project: recently finished and working on a review (sequel to Phoenix Project) Bathrobe: my preschooler wants one, so I’m sewing one. Sabbatical: mostly enjoying time to bake, exercise, and relax. Half Marathon: I’m training for a half marathon in January, and have been reading a lot about heart rate training and altitude (I live at 6k+ ft above sea level).
